attributes.action: DO NOT Revoke Article 50 and let us leave the EU as soon as possible.
attributes.additional_details: We are angry and tired of us the British public staying in this unknown territory and we want out of the shackles of the EU who have slowly and controllingly taken away more and more powers from our sovereign country and handed those decisions to a voting system that the UK has never won a vote that we’ve voted against, we are sick and tired of being bullied and taken for a ride, we deserve better and we are a powerful nation perfectly capable of standing on our own two feet!
attributes.background: We want to oppose the rising tide of the crying remain voters pushing for article 50 to be revoked and we the British public who voted for brexit would like it to be implemented as soon as possible, we are tired of the self serving politicians who don’t want to carry out the will of the people!
